com.mr_apps.androidbase.preferences

Class SecurityPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mr_apps.androidbase.preferences.AbstractBasePreferences
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.preferences.SecurityPreferences

  • public class SecurityPreferences
extends AbstractBasePreferences
    Class that handle the SharedPreferences for the WSSE Security
